title: I Was Proposed By A Villain - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Comedic Undertone   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Murders   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Survival   Transmigration
author: 13th Month's Dawn   십삼월의새벽
description:
I witnessed a murder scene of a villain.

To make matters worse, he caught me.

I think I hear the sound of death beckoning.

He approaches me, his hand in his coat.

I wonder what he’s reaching for.

A knife? A gun? I guess it doesn’t matter. There’s only one thing I can think of now.

“I’m going to die.”

I wasn’t expecting what he pulled out of his coat.

“Will you marry me?”

“What?”>
